About PureSpace

Excellence in every detail, since 2014. Transforming Nairobi, one clean space at a time. Over a decade of dedicated service to homes and businesses across the city.

Our Mission

We believe that a clean space is a reflection of a clear mind and healthy living. Our mission is to provide exceptional cleaning solutions that exceed expectations while maintaining the highest standards of professionalism, reliability, and environmental sustainability. We're committed to transforming spaces and enriching lives, one clean environment at a time. At PureSpace, we don't just clean - we create sanctuaries where people can thrive, work productively, and live healthily. Every project is an opportunity to deliver excellence and build lasting relationships with our valued clients.

Our Story

Founded in 2014 by a team of passionate entrepreneurs, PureSpace Cleaning began as a small venture with a big vision: to bring world-class cleaning standards to Nairobi. What started with just three dedicated team members has grown into a trusted partner for hundreds of homes and businesses across the city. Over the past decade, we've maintained our unwavering commitment to quality, integrity, and customer satisfaction through every step of our remarkable journey. From humble beginnings to becoming one of Nairobi's most trusted cleaning services, we've never compromised on our values. Today, we proudly serve over 500 satisfied clients while maintaining the personal touch that makes us special.

Why Choose Us

Trained and vetted cleaning professionals with thorough background checks and insurance coverage

100% eco-friendly and sustainable cleaning products safe for families and environment

Transparent pricing with no hidden costs or surprise charges ever

24/7 customer support via phone, email, and WhatsApp for your convenience

100% satisfaction guarantee - we'll re-clean for free if you're not completely happy

Quick response time with same-day or next-day service available for most requests

Flexible scheduling to fit your unique lifestyle and preferences perfectly

Professional insurance coverage for your complete peace of mind

Advanced equipment and proven cleaning techniques for superior results

Community-focused approach with support for local causes and sustainability

Our Values

Excellence: We never compromise on quality or attention to detail in every project

Integrity: Honest pricing and transparent communication always with our clients

Sustainability: Protecting our environment through eco-friendly practices and products

Reliability: You can count on us to show up and deliver consistently every time

Respect: We treat your space, time, and privacy with the utmost respect always

Community: Building long-term relationships with our valued clients and neighbors

Innovation: Continuously improving methods and adopting new cleaning technologies

Accountability: Taking responsibility for results and standing behind our work
